pages.text: Requirements: $(li)8 Crying Obsidian $(li)16 Obsidian $(li)4 Soul Fires
An example of how the ritual can be placed.

The Liber Barathrum is not a complete copy of Apollyon's original book. There are some tangents clearly written by other authors. One author seemed to describe a meeting with what they called, an 'Apostle'. They say that leaders of the Sharmat met in a circle of Obsidian and an Apostle appeared before them and told them secrets.

Perhaps, with some trickery, magic and a baiting material, you are capable of summoning one for your own purposes, though you shouldn't summon one within the Nether where they're at their most powerful.
